updates.title: Microsoft launches CoPilot Mode for Edge browser, directly competing with OpenAI's Atlas AI browser that launched just two days earlier. Both companies are racing to define the AI-powered web browsing experience.

Microsoft unveils 'Mico,' a new animated avatar for Copilot AI that brings back shades of the infamous Clippy assistant, complete with personality modes including 'real talk' and new group chat features.
OpenAI's Sora video app receives major update with video editing tools, pet and object 'cameos' for personalized AI videos, enhanced social features, and an Android version coming soon.

Anthropic's Claude AI chatbot is rolling out a 'memory' upgrade to all paid subscribers, allowing the AI to remember past conversations without prompting for more contextual and personalized interactions.
Wonder Studios, backed by OpenAI and DeepMind executives, raises $12M to bring AI-generated content to Hollywood, planning to double their engineering team and accelerate original content production.
